Hello to everyone. I received intensive messages about Taksim Gezi Park.
I am sure you have followed the explanations I made since the first day. Democracy is being tested, I said.
Opening of dialogue and dialogue is an indication of democratic progress. I believe that this process will produce good results.
Everybody should go home now.
The last three days I visited Rize, Artvin and Ardahan. The whole Black Sea was almost paradise.
There were festivals in the three villages. I share some of my views with you.
Rize means tea comes to mind. I also learned to cut tea as a Kayseri. http://t.co/29h7no1ylq
We stopped in every town along the way. http://t.co/oiyvgpbcmc
The enthusiasm was spectacular. http://t.co/zcwkrh7zrp
Deriner Dam is one of the most important dams in the world. I'm proud of you. http://t.co/85kem2akf7
Our soldiers waiting at Hovdu in Artvin ... http://t.co/mNEwbm2XFh
We did not stop people all the way ... This is Ardahan-Kars way ... http://t.co/4aQ262m0Fn

Here is the view of Turkey, there is no fighting noise in this view, there is no destruction in this view, there are people in this view.
If you want to hear the voice of democracy, law, national will, please come to Ankara. Watch Xincan at the beginning of the screens.
We came out wearing this way, we have the government of this nation.

Congratulations Cranes! The World Cup is our target! I will be with you in Brazil!
We are Turkey together.
For 17 days, millions of my brothers prayed to us in every city of Turkey, in many cities of the world.
I know that nuns, grandparents, mothers, dads, even children, for us, for the government, for the peace of their country, prayed.
My nationality looks at the things not only eye but heart. My nationality is open to heart.
You've seen the game you played. You have never made the trap. You understand the goal of the attacks.
Now here in this square you, as a single heart, that ugly game breaks "folks here," you cry all over the world.
Because we are Turkey together. Nobody's gonna get hurt this association. I hope that all of their enthusiasm will remain in their crops.
As a nation, we have such a resistance style. We destroy all the games, we overtake all the traps. We resist with prayer and cry.
We are resisting by saying silence, patience, "what is the place to go, what is the good times" but they do not understand it.
We have taken the darkness of May 27 with such a resistance. We were on 28 February, 12 September and 27 April.
Like some of them, we do not have handmade stone, Molotov cocktail, slingshot areas.
We were not the ones who made noise pollution by pushing on their horns until the end of the night. We have not been in the pan frying.
Is it the original Trip Park? Do not worry, we will explain all of these to you later.
You will see where this source is. A co-ordinate walking outside and inside. We will introduce this treacherous network to the nation.
We've handed our cops a hand, we're pathetic. At the beginning of our police, unfortunately, was attacked by a CHP who was a deputy. We were still patient.
@YolandeMakolo will u please summarise facts of ths case of students to pple asking n saying they dont know!? Thot it had been xplned enough
We drink in the glass. We have patience. They wrote insults on the walls. They are cursed as bad as morning. We were still patient.
Why are we so patient? Because we knew that the cam is the word.
@YolandeMakolo  the 16 who run away...
We will ask the judge for all these vandalities. We will not keep these people alive.
We will also be patient for 8 months. When it comes to the chest in front of the people, we will ask the account then.
Some politicians have made every kind of incitement to make a sectarian conflict with their rhetoric and actions.
In social media, false news was spread over fake accounts and incredible provocation was realized.
We did not respond to any of them in the same way. For we have not set this road by burning, burning, lie, and slander.

# Egypt heart of the Arab nation moaned for the sake of the Syrian people, who is exposed to a machine of destruction not before them by the # President # Syria
We will not be so happy to see the free Syrians living their united state on all their soil, which has shed the blood of their children, women and youth.

The Syrian people are subjected to a campaign of genocide and systematic ethnic cleansing fed by regional and international forces that do not care about the Syrian person, his dignity and his suffering. # President # Syria
Egypt's attitudes toward Syria are not subject to bidding or bargaining and stem from clear principles and clear determinants. #President
We stand together with the Syrian people to obtain their legitimate rights to freedom from tyranny and tyranny of tyrants and criminals # President # Syria
The people of Egypt supports the struggle of the Syrian people materially and morally, so that their rights and sovereignty will be achieved on their united land.
Egyptian policy is based on non-interference in the internal affairs of countries, but it stands steadfastly with the choices of peoples for themselves. # President # Syria
When the Syrian people ask us for help, we do not lag behind, but support the struggle of our brethren for freedom to choose who governs them. # President # Syria

We affirm that we support the united Syria under a new elected leadership representing all the spectrums of the Syrian people, because this is an internal Syrian demand, as is an Egyptian demand. #President
We decided today to cut all relations with the current Syrian regime # President # Syria
We decided today to close the Embassy of the Syrian regime in Cairo, and withdraw the Egyptian Chargé d'Affaires from Damascus # President # Syria
The Egyptian people stood with the Lebanese people and Hezbollah against the aggression against Lebanon in 2006, and today we stand against the aggression of Hezbollah on Syria # # President
The Egyptian people will not accept what his Syrian brother refuses to try to regenerate himself to be part of the future of Syria
# Egypt maintains the unity of Syrian soil away from all levels of division on the basis of geographical or sectarian and ethnic. Egypt will not allow the disruption of Syria # # President
We reject foreign military and political interference in Syria, whether it is the intervention of states or militias, and we refuse to dictate external will to the will of the people. #President
